TopicTitle: what do you think about red bull startos?

Articles.Content:
I recently i read about guy who wants do do jump from balloon http://www.redbullstratos.com/

it's pity that we cannot do this with ksp

2 Days, we are close.

I'm looking forward to this even though it isn't a jump from the "edge of space", we can see how well he does.

Good luck.
In fact, Red Bull could now build a space rocket, they already have capsule
